title: Duck Debugging EN
content: Rubber duck debugging is a technique where developers explain code line by line to uncover mistakes and hidden assumptions.

title: Duck Debugging ES
content: La depuracion con pato de goma ayuda a detectar errores al explicar el codigo paso a paso.

title: Retrieval Filters
content: Metadata filters can restrict retrieval by product, version, language, source, and date.

title: Service Guardrails
content: The API enforces request size limits and basic rate limiting to protect reliability.
